001package ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg;
002
003import java.time.Instant;
004import java.util.concurrent.ThreadLocalRandom;
005
006/**
007 * Generates ULID-style opaque identifiers for correlating protocol messages.
008 *
009 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
010 */
011public final class TransactionId {
012  private static final char[] ENC = "0123456789ABCDEFGHJKMNPQRSTVWXYZ".toCharArray();
013
014  private TransactionId() {}
015
016  /**
017   * Generates a lexicographically sortable identifier composed of timestamp and random bits.
018   *
019   * @return 26-character ULID-style identifier
020   * @implNote Uses {@link ThreadLocalRandom}; not suitable for cryptographic purposes.
021   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
022   */
023  public static String newId() {
024    long time = Instant.now().toEpochMilli();
025    long r1 = ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextLong();
026    long r2 = ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextLong();
027    char[] out = new char[26];
028    enc48(time, out, 0);
029    enc80(r1, r2, out);
030    return new String(out);
031  }
032
033  private static void enc48(long v, char[] d, int o) {
034    for (int i = 9; i >= 0; i--) {
035      d[o + i] = ENC[(int) (v & 31)];
036      v >>>= 5;
037    }
038  }
039
040  private static void enc80(long r1, long r2, char[] d) {
041    long a = (r1 << 16) | ((r2 >>> 48) & 0xFFFFL);
042    long b = r2 & 0x0000FFFFFFFFFFFFL;
043    for (int i = 25; i >= 10; i--) {
044      int idx = (int) ((i >= 18 ? b : a) & 31);
045      d[i] = ENC[idx];
046      if (i == 18) continue;
047      if (i > 18) {
048        b >>>= 5;
049      } else {
050        a >>>= 5;
051      }
052    }
053  }
054}
